1.「芸で得られる よろこびなんか まやかしだぜ。| 覚えとけ。芸は なんの役にも立: The pleasure you get from tricks is just a|trick. Remember that. Art is useless for|anything.

2.「……へへ 誰かと思ったら <cs_pchero>か。| 会いたかったぜ とーっ: ...hehe, look who it is, <cs_pchero>. I've|missed you, man...very much.

3.「ポルファンの元で 修行してるってことは| お前も ご立派な教えに共感してんだろ: I'm assuming that by training under Polfan,|you share his admirable teachings?

5.「……ハンッ クソが！ イライラさせやがる！| どいつもこいつも甘ちゃんで ヘド: ...Hanck, you son of a bitch! You're driving|me crazy! They're all so naive. They're|disgusting!

7.「いくぞ 弟弟子 <cs_pchero>よ！| 本当に芸で人を救えるのなら| そ: Let's go, <cs_pchero>! If you can really|save people with your art, prove it in front|of me!

8.「……ククク。なかなか やるな。| だが それでは オレは止められんぞ。: Kukuku. You're quite good. But that won't stop|me.

9.悪魔道化師ゲイザーの身体のキズが|見る見るうちに ふさがっていく。: The wounds on Demon Clown Gazer's body are|rapidly closing up.

10.「オレは 旅芸人を抹殺するため| 何度 ケガを負っても 復活する身体を| ルルル: I was given a body by Lulu Leach-sama that can|revive itself no matter how many times it is|injured in order to eliminate minstrels.

11.「弟弟子よ。お前の芸が いつわりでないのなら| 芸で人を救えるというのなら ポル: My apprentice. If your tricks are not a lie,|if you can save people with your tricks, then|do as Polfan told you and let me make a Bonk!

12.「……芸で 人なんか救えねえ。 | それがわかるまで 何百回でも 何千回でも|:
You can't save people with tricks. Until you|understand that, I will crush you over and|over again, no matter how many hundreds or|
|thousands of times!

14.「ポルファンの言葉が いつわりでないのなら| このオレを 止めてみせろ！: If Polfan's words are not a lie, then let me|stop you!

15.「……やるじゃねえか。弟弟子よ。| お前の芸 確かに見せてもらったぜ。: ...You're good. My apprentice. Your tricks,|I've certainly seen them.

17.「ひさしぶりに 人間のころの笑いを思いだした。| ははっ なかなか 面白かったよ: For the first time in a while, I remembered|laughing when I was human. Haha, that was|pretty funny...

18.「あ～あ せっかく キミの中にあった| 芸を憎む心を 利用してあげたのに。| ず: I took advantage of the hatred for art that|you had inside of you. You lost so easily.

19.「ルルルリーチ様は 人間のわりに| 邪悪なオーラを持っていた キミを気に入って|: Master Lulu Leach had an evil aura for a|human, but he liked you so much that he turned|you into a monster.

20.「もう 用済みだねぇ。| だいぶ 旅芸人を殺してくれたみたいだし| そろそろ 死: You've done your job. It looks like you've|killed enough minstrels, so it's time for you|to die.

21.「そ～れ！ 燃えちゃえ～♪| ３連続 メラゾーマ～♪: There you go! Let's burn~♪ Three Kafrizz in a|row~♪

24.「うっひょ～ これは死んだね～♪| 見てるだけで熱そう♪ 痛そう♪: Woo hoo~ this is dead.......looks hot just|looking at it......ouch.......

27.「み みせてくれ。| さい…ごに お前…の芸を…。: Let me see. Before... you... do... your...|tricks.

31.「はは……。そう…いえば| 母の…死に顔は おだやか…だった。: Well... come to think of it, my mother's face|was peaceful when she died.

32.「……きっと 母…も| 師匠の芸を見て……こんな風に| 安心して…旅立ったん…だ: I am sure that my mother...seeing her master's|art...must have felt at ease...like|this...when she left....

33.「……ははっ まい…ったな。| これが 芸は…人を救うということか。: I'll take that. So this is how a trick... is|to save people.

34.「師匠……。オレが まち…がってたよ。| あな…たは 確かに 芸で…人を……|: Master I was wrong. You... have indeed...|saved... people... with... your... tricks.
